short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Word Search help train your brain and improve your vocabulary. Play right on Chromeâ„¢ Browser!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_GB,es,e:
Word Search, the popular word puzzle game, is now available as a Chrome Extension in a convenient pop-up format that doesn't require an internet connection. Enjoy the addictive gameplay of Word Search directly from your Chrome browser, anytime and anywhere.

With the Word Search Chrome Extension, you can engage in the challenging task of finding hidden words within a grid without needing an internet connection. Test your vocabulary and observation skills as you search for words in various categories and difficulty levels.

Whether you're a word enthusiast or enjoy brain-teasing puzzles, the Chrome Extension version of Word Search offers a seamless and offline gaming experience. Get ready to embark on a word-hunting adventure in this captivating game, now available in a pop-up format on your Chrome browser.
